snippet.title: Selatria - Steam Next Fest: June 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Dragged into a re-awakened war, it is up to Mage, Melanie, and friends to take arms and summon up their strength to prevail against the assault on their home from an unruly usurper with a multigenerational grudge. Selatria is a turn-based RPG inspired by the 90’s classics.

Selatria is coming to Steam and itch.io in August 2024! 
Wishlist Today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1052040/Selatria/ 
Playable on Steam Deck - Play the Chapter 1 Demo for free! 

Trailer by: Jessica M. Jacuinde
Narration by: Jenny Wang
#steamnextfest #steamgame #steamdeck #rpg #rpgmaker #rpggames
